hero.title: I make apps
hero.description: I'm omi. I build things I wish existed. Sometimes they actually work, and that's always a nice surprise.
about.label: 01 — About
about.p1: I build small, useful things. Or useless things that make me smile.
about.p2: All side projects. Made for me, but maybe for you too.
